page.title: 02 THE LIBRARY_KINSON
page.content: { } The library is an important centre for information to the Kinson community.Its location is central with the added advantage of being near to the Community centre, the shops,with the provision of open air seating near by. Within the library there is a corner set aside for those in search of a job.There is an established link with the local Job centre.An area is set aside to provide leaflets on subjects such as Drugs,Family planning and Funeral benefits.The Citizens Advice Bureau operates in the library weekly. A Story_time is also a weekly event for the very young.
